pullRequest.title: Report an error when an included file doesn't have server or client a…

commit.message: Report an error when an included file doesn't have server or client as its root

beforeCommit.message: Report an error when an included file doesn't have server or client as its root

afterCommit.message: Report an error when an included file doesn't have server or client as its root

nodes.bodyText:
change
The configuration document {0} must begin with the element '{1}'.
to
The {0} configuration document must begin with the '{1}' element.
why is one offset with brackets and straight  quote? '{1}' Are both needed?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -472,5 +472,9 @@ variables.in.id.not.supported=CWWKG0104W: The ID attribute with value {1} for th
 variables.in.id.not.supported.explanation: Variable values are not allowed in ID attributes. All variables in ID attributes will be treated as literal strings.  
 variables.in.id.not.supported.useraction: Remove the variable from the value of the ID attribute.
 
+error.root.must.be.server=CWWKG0105E: The configuration document {0} must begin with the element '{1}'.

nodes.bodyText: how will the user know whether a client or server element is required?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -472,5 +472,9 @@ variables.in.id.not.supported=CWWKG0104W: The ID attribute with value {1} for th
 variables.in.id.not.supported.explanation: Variable values are not allowed in ID attributes. All variables in ID attributes will be treated as literal strings.  
 variables.in.id.not.supported.useraction: Remove the variable from the value of the ID attribute.
 
+error.root.must.be.server=CWWKG0105E: The configuration document {0} must begin with the element '{1}'.
+error.root.must.be.server.explanation=Configuration must be contained in either a server element or a client element.
